entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Support for Span<T> and ReadOnlySpan<T> in source-generated marshalling #69281
    7.0.0
  • Inliner uses capacity of locals table instead of count #69280
    7.0.0
  • clrgc.dll does not contain version info #69275
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Reflection.FunctionPointerInfo #69273
    7.0.0
  • NetworkStream.BeginRead not conforming to the contract #69269
  • [wasm-ep] Tracking #69268
  • Add constructor with string for SocketException #69266
  • [API Proposal]: New Method: Enum.HasAnyFlag(Enum) #69262
  • [Wasm] cannot load assets by mono_download_assets at out of AppBundle #69259
  • JIT: suboptimal generated for struct overlapped field manipulation #69254
  • Follow-up for Assembly.GetCallingAssembly() - tests and stack walk #69251
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add aliases informations to DependencyContext. #69245
  • TypeDelegator members DeclaringType is not the parent type #69244
  • Regressions in System.Threading.Tests.Perf_ThreadPool on arm64 #69258
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Int64 on arm64 #69257
  • Manual_CertificateOnlySentWhenValid_Success failures in rolling CI #69238
    7.0.0
  • Does the LibraryImportGenerator work for csharp projects only or any? #69233
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\NotSupported\\NotSupported_r\\NotSupported_r.cmd #69232
  • [Long Running Test] 'System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.FileStreamFlushAsyncThreadPoolDeadlockTest' #69231
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69230
    7.0.0
  • System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetConverter have incorrect nullable annotation #69229
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\22021\\consumer\\consumer.cmd #69224
  • Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler build fail #69223
  • CLRJit Access Violation on when attempting to run Windows ARM64 app #69222
  • Finish treating the Unsafe APIs as JIT intrinsics #69220

Closed

  • Marshaling string.Empty across the C#<->JS boundary may be broken #69002
  • Japanese culture is missing correct currency symbol in .NET 6 #69265
  • System.Private.CoreLib's fast up-to-date check is broken #68698
    Future
  • `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` should only use the ABI information #68645
    7.0.0
  • Compile-time source generation for System.Text.Json #45448
    7.0.0
  • jit.hardwareintrinsics.general.notsupported failing recently #69267
    7.0.0
  • Addressing security vulnerability in System.Text.Json 4.X version #68931
  • Unhandled exception out of BackgroundService initialization .NET 6 #69234
  • HTTP/3 request HttpContent cancellation is different from HTTP/2 #60253
    7.0.0
  • How to control HttpConnectionPool throttle? #68423
    Future
  • HTTP 400 ("Invalid Host header") for link-local IPv6 addresses #59341
    7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] PInvokeTableGenerator doesn't like the wasm-mt-eventpipe sample #68498
    7.0.0
  • IPV6 stack is required for .NET 5 #59015
    7.0.0
  • HttpClientHandler.AddClientCertificate ignores the certificate provided when the request reaches the server #66980
  • Add validation for packages that ship different API per TFM without versioning the assembly #942
    Future
  • .NET 7.0-preview3 Linux x64 stack overflow during GC under memory profiler (CRITICAL) #69052
  • SubjectName.Format displays in reverse #69049
    Future
  • [QUIC] IPv6 addresses don't work on Linux #67301
  • Better way to build non-stable non-shipping packages with non-private & non-experimenatal strings in their name #41561
    7.0.0
  • Testing non NetCoreAppCurrent .NETCoreApp configurations that ship as part of packages #48706
    7.0.0
  • We need a repo convention to ship source generators as part of the ref pack #61321
  • AnalyzerReference vs ProjectReference #69111
    7.0.0
  • Libraries linker tests aren't running in CI #69139
    7.0.0
  • Show full path for manually added test files in linker trimming tests output #38377
    Future
  • Test failure: Assertion failed 'addr->TypeIs(TYP_BYREF) || addr->IsIntegralConst(0)' #67600
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not create a comma temp form if it already is a comma temp form #69286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update LibraryImportGenerator unit tests with interpolated string arguments #69285
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement
  • Test fix for GetMemberWithSameMetadataDefinitionAs #69284
    area-System.Reflection
  • Wasm conditional audit #69283
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Collect more info for host tests #69282
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use PopCount in DriveInfoInternal.Windows.cs. #69279
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use static abstract members on two occasions. #69278
    community-contribution
  • Use the CertificateAuthority store for finding intermediate certs in macOS #69277
    area-System.Security
  • Add Stream ReadAtLeast and ReadExactly #69272
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Do not fold mismatched `OBJ(ADDR(LCL_VAR))` #69271
  • remove internal socket exception from NameResolution #69270
    area-System.Net
  • enable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #69264
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Optimise `LastIndexOfAnyExcept` #69261
    community-contribution
  • [WIP - Validation] Update the SDK to Preview4 #69260
  • Add regex test that reuses RegexMatchTests data for captures #69252
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Apply MaxResponseHeadersLength limit to trailing headers #69250
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Add clang 14 to known compiler versions. #69249
    community-contribution
  • #49936 fixed Text.Json failures on x86 android #69248
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Use IntegralRange in fgOptimizeRelationalComparisonWithCasts #69247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] More LLVM 14.x changes. #69239
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Update convention how to ref&pkg an analyzer again #69237
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • WIP: [Mono] Fix initial 4244 warnings. #69236
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • fix GetContentAsync_ErrorStatusCode_ExpectedExceptionThrown test #69228
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • Redhawk to NativeAOT #69227
    community-contribution

Merged

  • Enable nullable=enable by default for anything except tests #69256
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix memory leak at AssemblyLoadContext unload #69263
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add Akhil to fabricbot-config #69276
  • Define convention to consume and/or package analyzers #69069
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Generate the DAC table on Windows with MSVC linker directives instead of resource injection #68065
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: Capture test output with xunit, so the output is cleaner, and the #69201
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Fix CoreLib fast up-to-date check #69240
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Simplify `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` #68853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Treat `INDEX_ADDR`s as non-null #69209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add a few RegexGenerator tests for valid string arguments #69221
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • ARM64 - Consolidate 'msub' and 'madd' logic #68363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove properties that are already set globally #69255
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Remove "promoted parameter" tailcall limitation #69034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify SendContent cancellation between HTTP3 and HTTP2 #67954
    area-System.Net.Http
  • fix invalid Host header for link-local IPv6 #69203
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Various refactorings to share more code with future generators #67997
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Fix references in `System.Threading.ThreadPool.WebAssembly.Threading` #69191
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • make sure NetworkInfo works without IPv6 on Linux #69172
    area-System.Net, os-linux
  • Update NoTargets.SDK and remove unnecessary properties being set #69242
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix issue in verify regions #69177
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Do not discard byref zeros in `native int + byref` additions #68086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix `impBoxPatternMatch` #68382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable HardwareIntrinsics NotSupported test on arm64 #69241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix entry point for string marshalling tests with ownership transfer #69226
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-bug
  • Pull out some common code snippets for custom struct marshalling tests #69215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement
  • Update to a newer Roslyn compiler #69211
    area-Infrastructure
  • Unblock SDK merge by fixing Assembly.GetCallingAssembly() #69225
    area-System.Reflection, area-VM-coreclr
  • Revert "49936 text json failures" #69243
  • Stop running both normal and no_tiered_compilation scenarios for coreclr PRs #69178
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enable corelib source generator in design time #69235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • I noticed some initalizations were missing… #69176
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disable k-nucleotide-9 in llvmfullaot #69173
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix linker tests not running and show full path during trimming test execution #69118
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix message about missing constructor for CallerAllocatedBuffer support #69216
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix NTAuthentication.MakeSignature/VerifySignature on Linux #65679
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Treat System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe as intrinsic #68739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Adding Int128 and UInt128 with a base software implementation #69204
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support Requires on type in NativeAot #68978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix handling of custom type marshaller pinning with a different type than the native type. #69214
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Misc debugger improvements #68988
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix incorrect none_no value when NUMA node is undefined in distribute_other_procs #69082
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Prevent debugger deadlock with code versioning logic #68367
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Add GT_CHK_DIV_BY_ZERO #69170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incremental XxHash32/XxHash64 #69185
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Switch checked coreclr + libraries tests configs around in PRs #69180
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Adding analyzer/fixer for the Regex Source Generator #68976
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Normalize Nil PublicKeyToken to an empty array #69169
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly support to System.Text.Json #69160
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Substitute GT_RET_EXPR in inline candidate arguments #69117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Remove most usages of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add missing (uint) cast in regex generated code #69198
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add windows runtime packs as a workload #68981
    area-Build-mono
  • Add `BStrStringMarshaller` to source generator #69213
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add comment about PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync(0) #69217
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [wasm][debugger] Extract the main run loop from DevToolsClient, and #69219
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Revert "Revert "[mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation"" #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm-ep] Minimal diagnostic tracing configuration and sample #69158
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • Convert RsaPaddingProcessor to statics #68749
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Arm64: Make unroll code for cpblk non-interruptible #69202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Do not emit possible DIV_BY_ZERO/OVERFLOW exception blocks for non-zero/non-(negative one) constants #68945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix HTTP3 stress #69182
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add AppContext data support for DefaultMaxConnectionsPerServer #68952
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix missing metadata for ThreadPool Event #68876
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] JIT: fix scalability issue in redundant branch optimizer #68972
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Deadlock mitigation for debugging #69121
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • Merge several version of MsQuicStream SendAsync code #68772
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.9 #68765
    area-Build-mono
  • WIP: Eliminate unnecessary load in `TrySetSlot` #69164
    community-contribution
  • Update gcc leg to 12.1.0 #69188
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Removal of IBC infrastructure #68717
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Address some System.Formats.Tar TODOs (infra and syscalls) #69107
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix runtime-llvm pipeline #68495
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Draft] idea how to improve allocations when serializing primitive types #67223
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Share code between source-generated and built-in marshallers #69043
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Clear `NO_CSE` on struct addresses in `MorphCommaBlock` #69210
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wip] Run tests on more Android versions #64341
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux #67589
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • allow null TargetHost in SslClientAuthenticationOptions #69071
    area-System.Net.Security
  • avoid allocationg ApplicationProtocol in common case #69098
    area-System.Net.Security
  • GetTotalPauseDuration implementation #68835
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider using `PublishAot` for Android and Blazor WASM #25392
    7.0.1xx
  • .NET 7 Android projects try to restore Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.linux-* #25388
  • NU1505 appears in 17.3.0 Preview 1 #25387
  • Add aliases informations to deps.json. #25386
  • NU1507 build failure when updating to 6.0.300 from 6.0.202 #25379
  • Fix package signature verification when installing workloads. #25377
    6.0.3xx

Closed

  • Dotnet list command does not find custom obj path #25378

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable the 4.8.1 target in sdk style projects #25393
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp2.0 to the current framework #25257
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the RID target from lower win to the latest one #25258
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #24787
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Always detect if SelfContained was specified by the user #25367
    Servicing-approved, Area-NetSDK, 6.0.3xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1768452 #25346
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Servicing F# #25325
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • Pin the compiler version in RSG to an exact version #24598
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.2xx
  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads
  • Check if publishaot is used #25323
  • Support suppressing transitive framework reference downloads, and other changes #25358

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Define a syntax to conditionally set (init) properties in object initializers #6117

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • Discussion: Permit static lambda assignment to function pointers #3476

PullRequests

Created

  • Describe generic lifetimes and a proposed mapping for new syntax #6116

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shift+Enter removes XML comment of property #61291
  • Assertion hit in `SyntheticBoundNodeFactory.Convert` #61284
  • C# Code Generator and Code Analyzer don't Recognize Nested Enum as Belonging to Current Generic Class #61281
    Backlog
  • Quick action "Move contents to namespace..." does not appear when namespace is file-scoped #61280
    Backlog
  • Code Style: use block body for accessors: doesn't format correctly #61279
    Backlog
  • Refactoring: replacing switch statement with switch expression deletes preceding comments #61278
    Backlog
  • VB.NET: No refactoring for standard attribute <NonSerialized> #61277
  • [LSP] Use frozen partial semantics for document pull diagnostics #61275
  • InvalidCastException from embedded language bits #61270
  • Multi-line indenting inside a raw string literal doesn't handle inconsistent whitespace #61269
    17.3
  • "Go To Definition" on re-abstraction doesn't go the re-abstracted member #61268
    17.3
  • Convert to raw string doesn't offer to change semantics if there is only whitespace at the end of the string #61267
  • Please allow [assembly: TypeForwardedTo(typeof(T))] when T is [Obsolete] #61264
  • "Implement interface explicitly" fixer implements conversion operators implicitly #61263
  • AssemblySymbol.CorLibrary invariant could be broken #61262

Closed

  • Add aliases informations to deps.json. #61271
  • [EE] EE not formatting IAsyncEnumerable methods correctly #55606
    17.3
  • Add constructor parameter fails with System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #60816
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove eng/docker/mono.sh script #61292
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make static respect modifier order #61289
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Relax assertion in SyntheticBoundNodeFactory.Convert #61287
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow skeletons to be reused in frozen-partial scenarios (for inheritance margin) #61286
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for frozen-partial projects, and have skeleton assemblies work effectively for them #61282
    Area-IDE
  • Use SegmentedHashSet<T> to eliminate LOH allocations in AsyncBatchingWorkQueue #61276
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Support LSP services associated with LSP server instances (with lifetimes that match). #61266
    Area-IDE
  • Update dependency versions for 4.2.0 publishing #61265
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Give a specific message when analyzer references a more-recent compiler version #61261
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #61288
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move off of IOperation in speculation analyzer. #61257
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix a few build and package issues #61273
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Use proper variable group for generating insertions #61285
    Area-Infrastructure
  • ✨ Implement SegmentedHashSet<T> #54574
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add FixAll in Project and Solution support for AddFileBanner refactoring #61208
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Update FindRefs API to support searching for multiple symbols at the same time. #61248
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix for Issue #55606: [EE] Format IAsyncEnumerable method names correctly. #61211
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, Next
  • Support adding multiple parameters on new lines past the original last parameter #61048
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61260
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61295
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61294
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new collapsing option for metadata files that contain source #61205
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Need Design Review
  • More SyntaxContext sharing among CompletionProviders #61221
    Area-IDE
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove Razor and editor inference document option providers #61091
    Area-IDE
  • Fix nested in generic type binding issues in enabled nullability context #61182
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve command-line parsing for linux #60711
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • Change ServiceHub host names #60778
    Area-Infrastructure
  • ✨ Implement ImmutableSegmentedHashSet<T> #54719
    Area-Compilers
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • [LSP] Add JSON semantic token classifications #61231
    Area-IDE
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Relational Patterns are confused with tags in Razor #41668
  • Make RateLimiterMiddleware endpoint-aware #41667
    7.0-preview6
  • After installing 6.0.5 update, 6.0.4 Blazor app Windows service stops #41664
  • Setting User Token Reminding Attempt #41662
  • Blazor Server Windows Authentication + SignalR Hub on Windows Server 2019/ IIS 10.0 #41661
  • HTTP OPTIONS verb #41659
  • UseRateLimiter API deviates by the Action-based config approach #41655
  • dotnet watch locked on file changed #41654
  • SignalR HubConnectionBuilder doesn't pass Client Certificate to server. #41653
  • Blazor Wasm loading iOS mobile in the middle of page #41652
  • TraceIdentifier performance is inconsistent #41651

Closed

  • Add support for argument list surrogates in minimal APIs #40712
    7.0-preview5
  • The openapi2client (Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi) complains about specification extensions at the path item object level of an OpenAPI spec #41593
  • The openapi2client (Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi) complains about boolean valued required key on header object of OpenAPI spec #41595
  • CSS Isolation & RCL Support does not generate the correct CSS import for WASM Apps not hosted at root #41625
  • .NET SignalR client getting stuck sending messages #41150
    7.0-preview5
  • restore failed, error NU1103: Unable to find a stable package #41656
  • SignalR Client after Net7 preview 1 causes InvalidOperationException in WPF #41663
  • Multiple AuthenticationHandlers still not working as expected #41603
  • Blazor App: dotnet runtime 6.0.1 downloaded, but 6.0.5 SDK installed #41658
  • Unable to read appsettings using appcmd.exe #41596
  • run restore.cmd failed #41633
  • System.NullReferenceException at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpRequest.get_HasFormContentType() #41574
  • Add OffsetX and OffsetY for touch events #41619

PullRequests

Created

  • Using non-generic JsonWrite operation for ProblemHttpResult #41670
    area-runtime
  • [draft] JavaScript interop via [JSImport] and [JSExport] #41665
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • Changed the Rate Limiter API to action-based #41657
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Refactor DataProtection trimming #41650
    area-dataprotection
  • Fall back to using old command when GetServer isn't supported #41649
    area-runtime

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android]Can't tap with Frame in CollectionView on Android #7121
  • [Docs Request] Document SQLite Integration #7120
  • Scrolled event in scrollview not working #7119
  • [Shapes] Path render issues #7118
  • RC3 MauiIcon MauiSplashScreen svg are black #7115
  • VoiceOver doesn't navigate to items contained in a CollectionView which has a SemanticProperties.Description set #7114
  • Can no longer build for iOS, getting error: clang++ exited with code 1 #7113
  • Add implicit Parsing for System.Guid query parameters in shell navigation #7112
  • Image with Aspect of AspectFill in CollectionView item is not clipped to the item bounds #7111
  • Android : No text labels appear in Shell Flyout. (Using Xaminals app) #7105
  • [Android] MAUI Border class will clip StrokeShape #7103
  • Resizetizer doesn't keep color from SVG #7101
  • WebView Navigation Bar disappears and flickers in landscape mode #7100
  • CollectionView ItemSizingStrategy on Android, causes app to exit on startup #7097
  • Provide "Shell.TitleBarIsVisible" #7085
  • Tab appearance properties no effect on MenuBarItems. #7083
  • Shell on Windows: No Text #7082
  • <CollectionView.EmptyView> is only shown once #7076
  • Setting images in code (still) doesn't work on Android #7074
  • ImageButton visual state does not reset #7073
  • SVG extension Image does not work on ImageButton/Button #7066
  • 'Tab' button does not work when shift button from last button #7064
  • CollectionView EmptyView not working #7063
  • VS does not always show compile time errors of MAUI app #7061
  • Custom layout base on AbsoluteLayout will repeated measure many times #7060
  • Manual iOS Provisioning #7056
  • Page BackgroundColor Wrong on Windows #7054
  • On Android CollectionView selection and scroll not working properly #7053

Closed

  • Run on iOS Physical Device - error MT1216: Could not find the simulator UDID #6395
    6.0.300-servicing
  • System.InvalidOperationException: 'Native View not set' on Shell.Current.GoToAsync Android #6940
    6.0.300-servicing
  • After navigating back, button command is not responding to click #5987
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Offering help porting the Xamarin.forms tutorial over to .NET MAUI #6954
  • Boxview corner radius not working in Mac OS and iOS #5572
    6.0.300-servicing
  • CarouselView difficult to swipe on Android #6062
    6.0.300-servicing
  • MAUI Border doesn't expand #5895
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Nullable attributes are missing #7050
    6.0.300
  • missing OnBackButtonPressed function in maui blazor hybrid app #7096
  • Web support #7058
  • Flyout menu icon and Back button are not visible on the App targeting the Windows platform #7099
  • [Android] NavigationPage throws InvalidProgramException in Release #7027
    6.0.300
  • Reopen issue #4593. VS 17.2 prv6. Error NETSDK1130 Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.winmd cannot be referenced. Referencing a Windows Metadata component directly when targeting .NET 5 or higher is not supported. For more information, see https://aka.ms/netsdk1130 #6842
    6.0.300-servicing
  • How does updating of MAUI framework libs to a newer version works? #7069
  • Not found Microsoft.Maui.Essentials #7079
  • forceDarkAllowed in styles.xml #7081
  • Background color cannot be changed on page #7036
  • .NET MAUI iOS target publishing/archiving #4397
  • [Android] ArcSegment in a Clip renderders incorrectly on Android #7078
  • [Windows] ShowWindow with PInvoke #5661
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Alerts currently don't work if you call them from the constructor #1514
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Click Package.appxmanifest error #4585
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Automatic iOS Provisioning #7055
  • CollectionView on Android, SelectionChangedCommand does not get called #7035
  • upgrade from dotnet 6 to 7 errors #7040
  • Entry control with IsPassword="true" broken under Windows #6977
  • (Windows) RC1 - LayoutCycleException when maximizing window #6400
    6.0.300
  • If you change the theme after running the app, it will not be applied normally. #6876
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Not all controls responding to UserAppTheme Dark #6932
    6.0.300
  • Random System.NullReferenceException .Net Maui app under macOS #6645
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Error In reading and writing file in Android Emulator and windows from Maui project. #6754
    6.0.300-servicing
  • InvalidateMeasure in child triggers parent measure #3831
    6.0.300-servicing
  • RadioButton.Content renders type on Android #4683
    .NET 7
  • Compatibility: (Revised) Ported Xamarin Forms Effect registration never resolves #4269
    6.0.300
  • The UI elements of the screen overlap with StatusBar on iOS on Modal Page #6769
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created
